name: Desatranques Jaén (Commodore 64)
description:
DESATRANQUES JAÉN - THE GAME

ARGUMENT

Under your control you have the most powerful truck on twitter, capable of unlocking everything that is proposed. From the Desatranques plant, they have given the alert that the roads of Jaén and its surroundings are being invaded, preventing progress. Insects, rats, garbage, kamikaze drivers, heavy trucks, ... Everything has to be unlocked! Along with the rest of the Desatranques fleet, you must make your way down the road until you arrive safely at the Desatranques facilities. Will you be able to do it?

PHASES

It has four areas through which our truck must break through unlocking everything it finds on its way:

Phase 1: Highway to Jaén.
Phase 2: Jaén at night.
Phase 3: Surroundings of Jaén.
Phase 4: Exterior of Jaén and arrival at the Desatranques workshop.

NOTE:

Desatranques Jaén is based on a company with the same name, very popular in Spain.

The game is licensed by the brand for free distribution.

ADITIONAL INFORMATION

The game is developed with seuck, a maker that facilitates the creation of games but at the same time limits the options. However, to overcome these limitations and create it with that classic and functional aspect, we have implemented improvements to it to achieve what we wanted.

Originally published from : www.commodorespain.es

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

This game is prepared to play on a Commodore 64. using a Tapauino device. It can also be played on the C664 mini or maxi, or using compatible hardware such as emulation (Vice, CCS64, C64 forever, etc.).  Download the file and run the .tap file.
